des:
Control lights, fans, curtains etc. in your home or office with just your voice using SMART INDIA switches, fans etc. Simply link your SMART INDIA account and Ask Alexa to turn the lights on/off, adjust fan speeds and more.

In few simple steps, you can link SMART INDIA products with Alexa:

(1) Download "SMART INDIA" app from iOS or Android app store.
(2) Register & create your account using "SMART INDIA" app.
(3) Make sure you have purchased "SMART INDIA" hardware device & it is powered on. 
(4) Setup the device to join your local Wi-FI using "SMART INDIA" app and provide an easy to remember name (bedroom light or office fan) for your device which will be used by Alexa.
(5) Download Amazon "Alexa" app from iOS or Android app store.
(6) Configure Echo or other Alexa enabled speaker using the "Alexa" app. (You can even invoke Alexa commands from your "Alexa" mobile app)
(7) Search "SMART INDIA" skill from the "Alexa" app <Skills & Games> section
(8) Select "SMART INDIA" and Click "Enable Skill". This will redirect Alexa app to "SMART INDIA" login screen for account linking and validation. 
(9) Provide your "SMART INDIA" account details and authorize Amazon Alexa to access your "SMART INDIA" hardware devices.
(10) On successful account validation, the setup is READY to use Alexa to control your "SMART INDIA" hardware devices.
 
Now control your "SMART INDIA" hardware devices by Voice using: 

"Alexa, turn on/off bedroom light"
"Alexa, turn on/off the fan"
"Alexa, set the fan speed to 1/2/3/4/5"
"Alexa, set the fan speed to very low/low/medium/high/very high"
"Alexa, turn on/off kitchen light"
"Alexa, turn on/off conference room"

You can also create & schedule routines using Alexa to automate "SMART INDIA" devices. For example, "Alexa start meeting" will turn on all the conference room "SMART INDIA" switches.
